biotools.summary: Takes specific advantage of the geometry of the device to accurately segment and track cells using only phase-contrast images, and further provides a curation user interface with leveraged-editing, meaning that a set of related errors are often fixed with a single click.

bioschemas.name: MoMA
bioschemas.summary: Takes specific advantage of the geometry of the device to accurately segment and track cells using only phase-contrast images, and further provides a curation user interface with leveraged-editing, meaning that a set of related errors are often fixed with a single click.
